weAreLaunching: We are close to launch the first release of Etherna.
firstReleaseLimited: During the initial Alpha phase the number of users will be limited.
wantToParticipate: Want to partecipate? Click the button below.
transparencyDescription: Your channel, your narrative. We believe in freedom of speech.

0.title: No shadow banning
0.description: Be free to post whatever you want. We won't ban any content as long as it's legal.

1.title: Freedom of Speech
1.description: Upload what you enjoy to do. No videos will be censored. Everyone should be entitled to their own idea.

2.title: Open Source
2.description: All source code from our platform will be published on GitHub, and will be available and visible to anyone.

3.title: Community Based
3.description: All our decisions will be shared transparently with the help of users in our social platforms.

4.title: Censorship Resistant
4.description: We host data on a decentralized storage, and no one has the ability to remove any content, not even us.

usersDescription: Our vision is a future where the web is clear of invasive banners and where everyone supports content creators.

0.title: No Ads
0.description: Watch any videos without distractions and targeted advertising. You will be free to watch any content without annoying time-wasting ads.

1.title: Creativity
1.description: Creators can express themself with no concerns about the future of their account.

2.title: Supported by Viewers
2.description: Paying a very small amount â€“ based on the lot of time and quality of resources â€“ we shall be able to sustain our project and creators too!.

3.title: Scalable Revenue
3.description: Thanks to a pay per use model users can expect to have reasonable costs while at the same time generating revenue to support further development and our content creators as well.

web3Description: Web3 refers to the next generation of the web, where you own your data and you decide how to use it.

0.title: Decentralized Content
0.description: Every assets on Etherna, from your avatar to your videos, are stored on a decentralized file system call Swarm. We can't delete anything.

1.title: Permanent Data
1.description: Videos cannot be deleted from our decentralized storage. This means that you'll be responsible for what you upload.

extendableDescription: We provide an indexing protocol that everyone can modify and extend, so users can change the index to their favorite one and enjoy the content they like.

0.title: Custom Index
0.description: You can specify an index different from ours. That means everyone can build their own index and share it, making the users access completely different contents.

1.title: Custom Gateway
1.description: You can also specify a different Swarm Gateway to download assets and videos.

subcribeErrorDescription: There was a problem with your subscription request. Please try again.
subcribeErrorName: You must provide a valid name.
subcribeErrorEmail: You must provide a valid email address.
